subSections.title: Related characters
subSections.text:
* {{l|mul|[[逕]]}} ''({{w|Traditional Chinese|Traditional form}} of ''<big>迳</big>'', considered a {{w|Variant Chinese character|variant form}} of {{l|mul|徑}} in mainland China)''
* {{l|mul|[[徑]]}} ''(Orthodox {{w|Traditional Chinese characters|traditional form}} of {{l|mul|逕}} in mainland China)''
* <font size=4, lang=zh-hans>[[径#Translingual|径]]</font> ''({{w|Simplified Chinese|Simplified form}} of {{l|mul|逕}} and {{l|mul|徑}} in mainland China)''

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: This character is only used for placenames and personal names in mainland China. <!-- Refer https://zh.wikisource.org/wiki/通用規范漢字表#fn_d28 -->
